get_indices() And get_crypto()

Source: vignettes/get_indices_and_get_crypto.Rmd
get_indices_and_get_crypto.Rmd
library(financr)

This vignette is about financr::get_indices() and financr::get_crypto().

These functions offers the latest financial values of more than 40 world-indices and 100 crypto-currencies, respectively. These values are expressed in USD.

get_indices() return a data.frame with the latest financial value of major world financial indices.

indices <- get_indices()
str(indices)
#> 'data.frame':    41 obs. of  7 variables:
#>  $ symbol        : chr  "^GSPC" "^DJI" "^IXIC" "^NYA" ...
#>  $ name          : chr  "S&P 500" "Dow Jones Industrial Average" "NASDAQ Composite" "NYSE COMPOSITE (DJ)" ...
#>  $ price         : num  5074 38315 15588 17619 4608 ...
#>  $ change        : num  -322 -2231 -963 -1149 -308 ...
#>  $ change_percent: num  -5.97 -5.5 -5.82 -6.12 -6.27 ...
#>  $ volume        : num  6.05e+09 1.29e+09 9.14e+09 0.00 0.00 ...
#>  $ currency      : chr  "USD" "USD" "USD" "USD" ...
#>  - attr(*, "n.currencies")= int 1
#>  - attr(*, "currencies")= chr "USD"
#>  - attr(*, "date")= Date[1:1], format: "2025-04-06"
#>  - attr(*, "crypto")= logi FALSE

get_crypto() return a data.frame of 100 crypto-currencies values in USD ($).

krypt <- get_crypto()
str(krypt)
#> 'data.frame':    100 obs. of  13 variables:
#>  $ symbol                          : chr  "BTC-USD" "ETH-USD" "USDT-USD" "XRP-USD" ...
#>  $ name                            : chr  "Bitcoin USD" "Ethereum USD" "Tether USDt USD" "XRP USD" ...
#>  $ price                           : num  83426.74 1812.07 1 2.14 591.71 ...
#>  $ change                          : num  -5.17e+02 -5.11 6.20e-05 1.82e-02 -5.32 ...
#>  $ change_percent                  : num  -0.62 -0.28 0.01 0.86 -0.89 -0.8 0 -1.04 -1.81 -0.98 ...
#>  $ market_cap                      : num  1.66e+12 2.19e+11 1.44e+11 1.25e+11 8.43e+10 ...
#>  $ volume                          : num  1.42e+10 6.37e+09 3.37e+10 2.09e+09 1.00e+09 ...
#>  $ volume_in_currency_24hr         : num  1.42e+10 6.37e+09 3.37e+10 2.09e+09 1.00e+09 ...
#>  $ total_volume_all_currencies_24hr: num  1.42e+10 6.37e+09 3.37e+10 2.09e+09 1.00e+09 ...
#>  $ circulating_supply              : num  1.98e+07 1.21e+08 1.44e+11 5.83e+10 1.42e+08 ...
#>  $ x52_wk_change_percent           : num  20.88 -47.43 -0.03 257.91 2.31 ...
#>  $ from                            : chr  "BTC" "ETH" "USDT" "XRP" ...
#>  $ to                              : chr  "USD" "USD" "USD" "USD" ...
#>  - attr(*, "n.currencies")= int 101
#>  - attr(*, "currencies")= chr [1:101] "BTC" "ETH" "USDT" "XRP" ...
#>  - attr(*, "exchange")= chr [1:100] "BTC => USD" "ETH => USD" "USDT => USD" "XRP => USD" ...
#>  - attr(*, "date")= Date[1:1], format: "2025-04-06"
#>  - attr(*, "crypto")= logi TRUE
